constraint: The arithmetic expression shall only contain numbers (0-9) and arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /).
The arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /) in the arithmetic expression shall not appear consecutively.
result: (assert (forall ((i Int)) (=> (and (>= i 0) (< i (- (str.len s) 1))) (not (or (and (or (= (str.at s i) "+") (= (str.at s i) "-") (= (str.at s i) "*") (= (str.at s i) "/")) (or (= (str.at s (+ i 1)) "+") (= (str.at s (+ i 1)) "-") (= (str.at s (+ i 1)) "*") (= (str.at s (+ i 1)) "/")))))))

constraint: Except for the minus sign (-), every operator (+, *, /) in the arithmetic expression shall have a number before and after it.
The arithmetic expression shall not start with operators from the set {+, *, /}.
